entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 27 February 2023
